Here, I summarise the outputs from the models estimating occupancy trends for 54 British resident butterflies. 

I run the analyses on a computer cluser and must fist test whether all annual estimates have converged. 

```{r test-Rhat, }
# Source the function that loops through all model outputs and checks convergence, i.e. is Rhat >1.1?
source("./function-summarise_Rhat.R")

# Run function
RhatSummary <- summarise_Rhat("../outputs/2019_outputs/", verbose=FALSE)
RhatSummary
```
7 April: all 26 species have converged

Argynnis adippe and Boloria euphrosyne have not converged, lets take a closer look:

```{r non-converged-models, }
# 
require(sparta)
results_Aricia_artaxerxes_cick_40k <- readRDS("../outputs/modelOutputsMarch/results_Aricia_artaxerxes_cick_40k.rds")

results_Cupido_minimus_cick_40k <- readRDS("../outputs/modelOutputsMarch/results_Cupido_minimus_cick_40k.rds")

results_Polyommatus_bellargus_cick_40k <- readRDS("../outputs/modelOutputsMarch/results_Polyommatus_bellargus_cick_40k.rds")


plot.occDet_G(results_Aricia_artaxerxes_cick_40k)
plot.occDet_G(results_Cupido_minimus_cick_40k)
plot.occDet_G(results_Polyommatus_bellargus_cick_40k)


source("./function-plot.Occdet_G.R")
plot.occDet_G(results_Argynnis_paphia_watson_50k)
```
